title: Form component
description: This is the schema for the form component. This schema is used to create the form component in the builder and to render the form component in the frontend.

displayName.title: The text to display at the top of the form
displayName.description: This is typically the same as the name of the form, but can be different if you want to display a different title at the top of the form.

onSubmit.title: The actions to perform when the form is submitted

resultHtml.title: The HTML to display when the form is submitted
resultHtml.default: Thank you for submitting the form.

saveProgress.title: Save the progress of the form when the user leaves the page

offline.title: Allow the form to be used offline

singleSubmissionSelected.title: Enable single submission per user
singleSubmissionSelected.description: Prevent users from submitting the form more than once based on an identifier column

singleSubmissionField.title: Identifier column name
singleSubmissionField.description: The data source column used to detect existing submissions

fields.title: The fields of this form
fields.description: This is an array of fields that make up the form. The order of the fields in this array will be the order in which they appear on the form. The last field in this array should always be the 'flButtons' field.

label.title: The label of the field to display in the screen

_submit.title: Whether this field should be submitted with the form

canHide.title: Whether this field can be hidden

isHidden.title: Whether this field is hidden by default

required.title: Whether this field is required to submit the form

showLabel.title: Whether this field should show the label

placeholder.title: The placeholder of the field when there is no content added

defaultValueSource.title: The source of the default value

defaultValueKey.title: The key of the default value to look up in the defined source

manualInput.title: Allow users manually add or edit address

storeInSeparateFields.title: Enable to store each part of the address data in separate fields

createdAt.title: Save timestamp when form is first submitted

updatedAt.title: Save timestamp every time form is updated

mapType.title: Allow users to change map type

autoCollectUserLocation.title: Automatically collect the user's location when permission is granted.

oneOf.title: A generic input for text
oneOf.description: This is the most basic input field. It can be used for any text input.

oneOf.title: A input to enter an email address
oneOf.description: This is a special input field that is used to enter an email address. It will validate the email address to ensure it is in the correct format.

oneOf.title: A generic input for numbers
oneOf.description: This is a special input field that is used to enter a number. It will validate the number to ensure it is in the correct format.

oneOf.title: A generic input for telephone numbers
oneOf.description: This is a special input field that is used to enter a telephone number. It will validate the telephone number to ensure it is in the correct format.

oneOf.title: A generic input for urls and links
oneOf.description: This is a special input field that is used to enter a url or link. It will validate the url to ensure it is in the correct format.

oneOf.title: The required form submit buttons.
oneOf.description: This is a special field that is required for the form to function properly. It should always be present as the last field of the form.

oneOf.title: A generic input for passwords
oneOf.description: This is a special input field that is used to enter a password. It will validate the password to ensure it is in the correct format. It will also have an optional confirmation field to ensure the password was entered correctly.

hash.title: Whether the password should be securely hashed before being saved to the database.

confirm.title: Whether a confirmation field should be shown for this password field.

submitWhenFalsy.title: Whether the form should be submitted when the password field is empty.

autogenerateLength.title: The length of the password to autogenerate.

oneOf.title: A wysiwyg textarea editor with rich content text editing capabilities
A textarea editor with basic text editing capabilities
A field to select a date
A field to select a time
A select field to choose one option from a list

label.title: The label to display for the option

value.title: The value to save for the option

oneOf.title: A radio field to choose one option from a list

label.title: The label to display for the option

value.title: The value to save for the option

oneOf.title: A multi-select checkbox field to choose one or more options from a list

label.title: The label to display for the option

value.title: The value to save for the option

oneOf.title: A field to select an image to upload
oneOf.description: This is a special input field that is used to upload an image. It will validate the image to ensure it is in the correct format.

oneOf.title: A field to select a file to upload
oneOf.description: This is a special input field that is used to upload a file. It will validate the file to ensure it is in the correct format.

oneOf.title: A field to add a read-only text string displayed as a title
oneOf.description: This is a special input field that is used to display a title. It will not be saved to the database.

oneOf.title: A field to add a read-only text string displayed as a paragraph
oneOf.description: This is a special input field that is used to display a paragraph. It will not be saved to the database.

oneOf.title: A field to select a rating from 1 to 5 stars
oneOf.description: This is a special input field that is used to let the user select a rating.

oneOf.title: A field to write a signature
oneOf.description: This is a special input field that is used by the user write a signature using their finger.

oneOf.title: A generic input for address
oneOf.description: This is a special input field that is used to enter an address. It provides autocomplete suggestions.

oneOf.title: A field to add a timeStamp
oneOf.description: This is a special input field that is used to automatically record the exact date and time when a user submits a form.

oneOf.title: A generic input for address and map
oneOf.description: This is a specialized field designed for entering addresses, either by typing into the input to get autocomplete suggestions or by pinning a location directly on the map.

value.title: The value to save the address along with its latitude and longitude.
